1001780.name: DX-Ball 2: 20th Anniversary Edition - Board Pack 2
1001780.description:
Board Pack 2 adds more than 150 new boards for DX-Ball 2 including 5 re-mastered sets from the original game plus a brand new set exclusive to the anniversary edition!

Note: All content in this pack is included in the DX-Ball 2: 20th Anniversary Edition Season Pass. You do *not* need to purchase this DLC if you already own a Season Pass.

Pack Contents:
  • Re-mastered versions of the original Board Pack 2 sets: "Agamemnon's Revenge", "Kicks, Hats and Wraps", "Stingers, Legs and Backs", "Coveting the Grail" and "Babes and Matriarchs".
  • The brand new "Anniversary Set Part 2" with 20 exclusive boards inspired by two decades of Longbow's games.
  • More than 40 new charms to collect.
  • Online leaderboards for all 6 new sets.
